titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1769) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to comply with the World Trade Organization rulings on the FSC/ETI benefit in a manner that preserves jobs and production activities in the United States.

Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1769) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to comply with the World Trade Organization rulings on the FSC/ETI benefit in a manner that preserves jobs and production activities in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Hill. Petition No: 108-5.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1769 (Job Protection Act of 2003, with respect to World Trade Organization rulings on the foreign sales corporation/extraterritorial income (FSC/ETI) exclusion under the Internal Revenue Code).
